blog.name: cam-rowe
blog.title: finger monkey
blog.description: Camille Rowe-Pourcheresse is a French-American model and occasional actress. This blog is here to document and update her projects, style, social media activities and so on.

summary: I wish Nadine hadn't said anything. Now these so called fans are going to know that their harassment is effective. They do it to...
question: I wish Nadine hadn't said anything. Now these so called fans are going to know that their harassment is effective. They do it to chase these women away and it's working. Caroline Flack as far back as 2011 was the first to talk about it and as a tv personality, public approval matters to her. Camille seemed to try to deal with it by reducing her time on SM and blocking nasty comments but that also showed that it affected her. These women move on to happier relationships while Harry is alone.
answer: To be fair, Nadine probably thought that speaking about it would raise awareness about verbal harassment on social media and how it can damage one’s mental health. I personally think that that’s her experience and she has every right to speak about it and let these haters know that their behavior has hurt her. It’s honestly the haters/fangirls’ issues that they can’t recognize that what they’ve done/doing to this day is abusive and can have serious impacts on a person’s life. It’s twisted that they take pleasure in knowing that they’ve succeeded in making someone feel bad about themselves and all this over a guy they claim to support. Also It’s much easier to just say that these women should ignore it and appear unfazed when you’re not in their position. I bet some of these girls are really tough but some things just get under your skin, it can’t be helped. Camille obviously decided to block and deleted comments because she recognizes that seeing/reading all the lies, slanders and insults will eventually take a toll on her mental health and if that’s what she needed to do to protect herself, then so be it. And don’t get me wrong, I feel for Harry. I can’t imagine how difficult it must be to date someone and have to explain to them that they’re going to have to deal with the bs if they want to make the relationship work. Plus, like I’ve said before, it can’t be nice to have to watch people who claim to be your fans bash your loved ones for a hobby.

reblog.comment: To be fair, Nadine probably thought that speaking about it would raise awareness about verbal harassment on social media and how it can damage one’s mental health. I personally think that that’s her experience and she has every right to speak about it and let these haters know that their behavior has hurt her. It’s honestly the haters/fangirls’ issues that they can’t recognize that what they’ve done/doing to this day is abusive and can have serious impacts on a person’s life. It’s twisted that they take pleasure in knowing that they’ve succeeded in making someone feel bad about themselves and all this over a guy they claim to support. Also It’s much easier to just say that these women should ignore it and appear unfazed when you’re not in their position. I bet some of these girls are really tough but some things just get under your skin, it can’t be helped. Camille obviously decided to block and deleted comments because she recognizes that seeing/reading all the lies, slanders and insults will eventually take a toll on her mental health and if that’s what she needed to do to protect herself, then so be it. And don’t get me wrong, I feel for Harry. I can’t imagine how difficult it must be to date someone and have to explain to them that they’re going to have to deal with the bs if they want to make the relationship work. Plus, like I’ve said before, it can’t be nice to have to watch people who claim to be your fans bash your loved ones for a hobby.

I personally think that that’s her experience and she has every right to speak about it and let these haters know that their behavior has hurt her. It’s honestly the haters/fangirls’ issues that they can’t recognize that what they’ve done/doing to this day is abusive and can have serious impacts on a person’s life. title: Harry Styles Random Post #1
body:
Harry Styles Random Post #1

I seriously think he looks like Justin Beiber! Haha! But even though he wasn’t my fave then, he seriously got this voice, aaaaaaaaaaaaaa, can’t help but spazz. Anyway, in the last photo, that was a joke. He didn’t say that though people have been shipping Harry and Louis (Larry Stylinson) and they actually speculate that they’re gay. They’re really chummy and they live in the same pad. Please,…

View On WordPress

title: Beautiful Thing
body:
Without you here I am boring. Something inside you is triggering, it makes me myself, makes me funny. You’re a beautiful thing.

11

Never would I had thought that I would wake up next to Harry Styles in the morning. It was always a fantasy of mine I had when I went through my… I guess you can call it, “Missing Harry” phase; but…

Read more…

summary:
"Where is she?"
I heard noise from where I was getting ready in a small room near the wedding venue.I admired the material of my...
body:
a brick,a wedding dress and Pennywise the dancing clown

“Where is she?”

I heard noise from where I was getting ready in a small room near the wedding venue.I admired the material of my extremely expensive gucci wedding dress that Harry has specifically requested for our special day.The dress was strapless with lace details all over my torso and a long skirt with tule all over it and small pearls.The veil was 5ft long with small flowers embroided into the fabric.It looked like something straight out of a fairytale unlike my relationship with Harry.My shoes were white pumps with gold details and Harry’s initials sewn to the side.

“WHERE IS SHE?"This time the voice was heard much louder and much closer as I realised it blelonged to Harry.There’s no chance he’s looking for me,he probably wants to talk to Anne or some other member of the wedding staff.

My hopes were soon vanished as I heard him pounding on my door."OPEN THE DOOR NOW.I’LL KILL YOU."He screamed like a mad man even though I was used to it by then.

"Harry the groom is not supposed to see the bride before the wedding.It’s bad luck."I tried to convince him but of course,he was not having it.

"OPEN THE GOD DAMN DOOR OR I SWEAR I’LL END YOU.I DON’T EVEN CARE ABOUT BAD LUCK IT’S NOT LIKE WE’D HAVE GOOD LUCK ANYWAY"He yelled even louder while pushing the door with all his weight.

"Harry,please leave.We’ll-"before I had the chance to finish my sentence the door burst open end Harry stormed in slamming the partly broken door shut behind him.I had managed to catch a glimpse of the terrified friends and family standing outside.We’ll,at the moment they weren’t half as terrified as I was.

"WHERE THE FUCK IS MY WEDDING DRESS.I GOT IN THE ROOM TO GET DRESSED AND FOUND NOTHING."He screamed at me from where her was standing pointing to his red checkered gucci suit.

"Harry please calm down.We talked about this.It’s not right for you to wear a wedding dress too. You promised me."I tried to reason with him while fumbling with my engagment ring."No!I only said that I would wear a suit cause I was fucking drunk!You always make me do stupid things when I’m drunk."He said referencing all the times he told me he loved me while drunk and his also very drunk wedding proposal.

"I’m sorry okay?But please dont wear that suit,you know I don’t like it.You have so many and this one makes you look like Pennywise the dancing clown.”

“What did you just say?"He looked at me in the eyes and I felt the blood stopping in my veins."I-um.I-”

“YOU BITCH.I HATE YOU!"he screamed pulling a brick he was hiding behind his back and throwing it at me.It his my wedding dress tearing the delicate material and leaving huge mud stains everywhere.

"WHAT THE FUCK HARRY.MY WEDDING DRESS.YOU RUINED IT."I screamed as tears started running down my face ruining my make up.My special day was ruined forever.I would never be able to face the guests looking like that.

Harry didn’t even look half sorry as I made my way towards him sobbing."I hate you so much,you always take the things that I love and ruin them,you yell at me and treat me like fucking rubbish all the time.Hell,you even broke my nose,Harry.You’re a heartless monster."I cried while jabbing my finger against his chest.

His eyes looked at me in pity for what felt like a second before he was back to his normal self."Stop trying to guilt trip me, okay?You should have seen this coming, baby girl.I told you how much I wanted to wear a wedding dress too,didn’t I?You fucking deserved that brick thrown at you."He explained while stroking my cheek."Now stop crying,you look fucking ugly when you do.”

“No,you don’t get it,Harry.We can’t get married now."I explained while shoving his hand away.

"What do you mean we can’t get married?Do you want me to go off again,cause you’re really asking for it."He said while pushing me back a little."The dress was a gucci custom made one and you ruined it.There’s no way I can fix it with the wedding starting in less than an hour.It took them six fucking months to make it.We can’t just ask them to do it again."I sobbed again.

Harry smirked and took a step closer while leaning in my ear."Bitch,I’m Harry Styles.”

“Where is she?”

I heard noise from where I was getting ready in a small room near the wedding venue.I admired the material of my extremely expensive gucci wedding dress that Harry has specifically requested for our special day.The dress was strapless with lace details all over my torso and a long skirt with tule all over it and small pearls.The veil was 5ft long with small flowers embroided into the fabric.It looked like something straight out of a fairytale unlike my relationship with Harry.My shoes were white pumps with gold details and Harry’s initials sewn to the side.

“WHERE IS SHE?"This time the voice was heard much louder and much closer as I realised it blelonged to Harry.There’s no chance he’s looking for me,he probably wants to talk to Anne or some other member of the wedding staff.

My hopes were soon vanished as I heard him pounding on my door."OPEN THE DOOR NOW.I’LL KILL YOU."He screamed like a mad man even though I was used to it by then.

"Harry the groom is not supposed to see the bride before the wedding.It’s bad luck."I tried to convince him but of course,he was not having it.

"OPEN THE GOD DAMN DOOR OR I SWEAR I’LL END YOU.I DON’T EVEN CARE ABOUT BAD LUCK IT’S NOT LIKE WE’D HAVE GOOD LUCK ANYWAY"He yelled even louder while pushing the door with all his weight.

"Harry,please leave.We’ll-"before I had the chance to finish my sentence the door burst open end Harry stormed in slamming the partly broken door shut behind him.I had managed to catch a glimpse of the terrified friends and family standing outside.We’ll,at the moment they weren’t half as terrified as I was.

"WHERE THE FUCK IS MY WEDDING DRESS.I GOT IN THE ROOM TO GET DRESSED AND FOUND NOTHING."He screamed at me from where her was standing pointing to his red checkered gucci suit.

"Harry please calm down.We talked about this.It’s not right for you to wear a wedding dress too. You promised me."I tried to reason with him while fumbling with my engagment ring."No!I only said that I would wear a suit cause I was fucking drunk!You always make me do stupid things when I’m drunk."He said referencing all the times he told me he loved me while drunk and his also very drunk wedding proposal.

"I’m sorry okay?But please dont wear that suit,you know I don’t like it.You have so many and this one makes you look like Pennywise the dancing clown.”

“What did you just say?"He looked at me in the eyes and I felt the blood stopping in my veins."I-um.I-”

“YOU BITCH.I HATE YOU!"he screamed pulling a brick he was hiding behind his back and throwing it at me.It his my wedding dress tearing the delicate material and leaving huge mud stains everywhere.

"WHAT THE FUCK HARRY.MY WEDDING DRESS.YOU RUINED IT."I screamed as tears started running down my face ruining my make up.My special day was ruined forever.I would never be able to face the guests looking like that.

Harry didn’t even look half sorry as I made my way towards him sobbing."I hate you so much,you always take the things that I love and ruin them,you yell at me and treat me like fucking rubbish all the time.Hell,you even broke my nose,Harry.You’re a heartless monster."I cried while jabbing my finger against his chest.

His eyes looked at me in pity for what felt like a second before he was back to his normal self."Stop trying to guilt trip me, okay?You should have seen this coming, baby girl.I told you how much I wanted to wear a wedding dress too,didn’t I?You fucking deserved that brick thrown at you."He explained while stroking my cheek."Now stop crying,you look fucking ugly when you do.”

“No,you don’t get it,Harry.We can’t get married now."I explained while shoving his hand away.

"What do you mean we can’t get married?Do you want me to go off again,cause you’re really asking for it."He said while pushing me back a little."The dress was a gucci custom made one and you ruined it.There’s no way I can fix it with the wedding starting in less than an hour.It took them six fucking months to make it.We can’t just ask them to do it again."I sobbed again.

Harry smirked and took a step closer while leaning in my ear."Bitch,I’m Harry Styles.”
